page.title: 15Ferryhill Leisure Centre
page.content: The Leisure Centre is in the Broom district of Ferryhill.It is a large, modern building which was opened in 1982.It is owned by Sedgefield District Council. The Centre caters for indoor activities.It has one large hall which is used for football,badminton,karate and other sporting activities.There are two squash courts. The sports hall is also used as an entertainment venue with discos and live performers.There is a small conference hall used for meetings which can also serve as a cinema. There is a large licensed bar but food is available only from vending machines.
